Title: Sleeveless Pleated Evening Dress with Belt

Sizes: 14, 6, 16, 20, 12, 4, 18, 8, 22, 10

Colors: black, royal, burgundy, red, aqua, blush

Category: bridesmaid, evening

----

Featured-image: W0014-red-sleeveless-pleated-evening-dress-with-belt_p.jpg

----

Description: Simple and elegant pleated gown. The shoulder straps and bodice are pleated and cascade into a tighter pleating at the waist. The A-line waist is belted with a braided piece and separates the bodice from the long pleated chiffon skirt.
